solver.propagation

Interface IPropagationEngine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoPropagationEngine, SevenQueuesPropagatorEngine, TwoBucketPropagationEngine

    public interface IPropagationEngine
extends Serializable
    An interface for propagation engines, it defines every required services.
    Since:
    05/12/11
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme
